title: Council Decision of 28 February 2000 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 28 February 2000
appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
(2000/C 69/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second and third paragraphs of Article 54 thereof,
Having regard to Article X of the Statutes of the Euratom Supply Agency(1), as last amended by Decision 95/1/EC, Euratom, ECSC of 1 January 1995(2),
Having regard to the Council Decision of 14 June 1999 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency(3),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas:
A member's seat on the aforementioned Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Ian HOLT, which was brought to the Council's attention on 3 November 1999.
That vacancy should be filled;
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the United Kingdom Government on 3 November 1999,
main_body: Mr Maurice STRIKE is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency for the remainder of the Committee's term of office, i.e. until 28 March 2001.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 2000.
For the Council
The President
J. PINA MOURA
(1) OJ 27, 6.12.1958, p. 534/58.
(2) OJ L 1, 1.1.1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ C 186, 2.7.1999, p. 1.
